entities.name: AIoDConcept
entities.description: The top level entity of the model

properties.name: platform
properties.description: The platform from which this asset originates. For instance HuggingFace or Zenodo.

properties.name: platformIdentifier
properties.description: The identifier used to denote this asset in its originating platform.

properties.name: editor
properties.description: The person responsible for creating and maintaining the entry.

properties.name: entryCreated
properties.description: The datetime on which this resource was first added to the AIoD platform.

properties.name: entryPublished
properties.description: The datetime on which this resource was first published on any platform - not necessarily on AIoD.

properties.name: dateModified
properties.description: Last datetime that the metadata of this resource was updated.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status of the entry (published, draft, rejected)

properties.name: body
properties.description: The main body of the AIoD entry for a resource

entities.name: AIResource
entities.description: A source of information, guidance or research and development assets for AI

properties.name: name
properties.description: A name given to the resource

properties.name: alternateName
properties.description: An alternative name commonly used for the resource in place of its name

properties.name: description
properties.description: A usually short informative text on the resource

properties.name: keyword
properties.description: terms or phrases providing additional context for the resource.

properties.name: industrialSector
properties.description: An industrial sector where a resource is or can be of use (possibly in the context of a larger framework or initiative).

properties.name: researchArea
properties.description: A research area under which the research problems remedied by the resource fall

properties.name: scientificDomain
properties.description: A scientific domain where the activities, operations or outcomes of the resource are applicable.

properties.name: documentedIn
properties.description: A Knowledge Asset describing and documenting the given resource.

properties.name: image
properties.description: An image depicting or associated with the resource

properties.name: contact
properties.description: A contact person for acquiring information on the resource.

properties.name: location
properties.description: A geographical specification of where the resource resides.

properties.name: sameAs
properties.description: A link to a web location with information on the resource.

properties.name: isPartOf
properties.description: A resource that includes this resource.

properties.name: hasPart
properties.description: A resource that is included as a part/component of this resource.

entities.name: AIAsset
entities.description: An accessible and usable asset pertaining to AI research and applications

properties.name: distribution
properties.description: A Distribution of the AI Asset

properties.name: citation
properties.description: A bibliographic reference for the AI asset.

properties.name: license
properties.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

properties.name: creator
properties.description: An entity responsible for making the AI asset.

properties.name: dateCreated
properties.description: The date of creation for the AI asset.

properties.name: datePublished
properties.description: The date of publication (broader availability) for the AI asset.

entities.name: Dataset
entities.description: A collection of data, published or curated by a specific agency

properties.name: issn
properties.description: The International Standard Serial Number (ISSN) that identifies this serial publication. You can repeat this property to identify different formats of, or the linking ISSN (ISSN-L) for, this serial publication.

properties.name: measurementTechnique
properties.description: The technique, technology, or methodology used in a dataset, which can correspond to the variable(s) described in variableMeasured.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the Dataset in the unit specified by the associated Size entity.

properties.name: spatialCoverage
properties.description: You can provide a single point that describes the spatial aspect of the dataset. Only include this property if the dataset has a spatial dimension. For example, a single point where all the measurements were collected, or the coordinates of a bounding box for an area.

properties.name: temporalCoverage
properties.description: The temporalCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the period that the content applies to, i.e. that it describes, either as a DateTime or as a textual string indicating a time period in ISO 8601 time interval format. In the case of a Dataset it will typically indicate the relevant time period in a precise notation (e.g. for a 2011 census dataset, the year 2011 would be written 2011/2012).

properties.name: variableMeasured
properties.description: The variable that this dataset measures. For example, “temperature” or “pressure”.

entities.name: MLModel
entities.description: A machine learning model.

properties.name: pid
properties.description: A permanent identifier for the model.

properties.name: experimentTimeMSec
properties.description: The time (in msec) the experiment takes to be executed.

entities.name: Experiment
entities.description: A machine learning model.

properties.name: pid
properties.description: A permanent identifier for the model.

properties.name: experimentalWorkflow
properties.description: A description of the overall workflow of the experiment.

properties.name: exemplaryExecutionSettings
properties.description: A human-readable description of the settings under which the experiment was executed to retrieve the included times.

properties.name: executionTimeEstimateSec
properties.description: The estimate of time needed for the execution under the conditions specified via the exemplaryExecutionSettings property.

properties.name: reproducibilityExplanation
properties.description: A description on how the output of the experiment match the experiments in the paper.

properties.name: badge
properties.description: A reproducibility badge associated with the Experiment.

entities.name: Distribution
entities.description: A specific form of packaging and means of exposure and availability for an AI Asset.

properties.name: documentedIn
properties.description: A Knowledge Asset describing and documenting the given Distribution.

properties.name: technologyReadinessLevel
properties.description: The technology readiness level (TRL) of the distribution, following the relevant EC definitions.

properties.name: contentURL
properties.description: Actual bytes of the media object, for example the image file or video file.

properties.name: contentSizeKb
properties.description: Full size in kilobytes

properties.name: encodingFormat
properties.description: Media type typically expressed using a MIME format, e.g. application/zip for a SoftwareApplication binary, audio/mpeg for .mp3 etc.

properties.name: hasComputationalRequirement
properties.description: A set of requirements for compute environment/storage/processing that the distribution needs in order to function. This will allow its association with Computational Assets covering its requirements.

entities.name: DataDownload
entities.description: A distribution of a dataset as a downloadable file or file collection.

entities.name: ComputationalAsset
entities.description: An AI Asset that constitutes or provides access to computational resources for processing or storage.

properties.name: creationTime
properties.description: Timestamp describing when the entity instance was generated.

properties.name: validity
properties.description: The duration (in seconds) after CreationTime that the information presented in the Entity SHOULD be considered relevant. After that period has elapsed, the information SHOULD NOT be considered relevant.

properties.name: otherInfo
properties.description: Placeholder to publish info that does not fit in any other attribute. Free-form string, comma-separated tags, (name, value ) pair are all examples of valid syntax.

properties.name: capability
properties.description: The provided capability according to the Open Grid Service Architecture (OGSA) architecture [OGF-GFD80] (this is the union of all values assigned to the capability attribute of the endpoints part of this service).

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of service according to a namespace-based classification (the namespace MAY be related to a middleware name, an organization or other concepts; org.ogf.glue is reserved for the OGF GLUE Working Group).

properties.name: qualityLevel
properties.description: Maturity of the service in terms of quality of the software components.

properties.name: statusInfo
properties.description: Web page providing additional information like monitoring aspects.

properties.name: complexity
properties.description: Human-readable summary description of the complexity in terms of the number of endpoint types, shares and resources. The syntax should be: endpointType=X, share=Y, resource=Z.

properties.name: hasEndpoint
properties.description: A computing service exposes zero or more computing endpoints.

properties.name: hasShare
properties.description: A computing service offers zero or more computing shares.

properties.name: managedBy
properties.description: A computing service offers zero or more computing managers.

properties.name: location
properties.description: A service is primary located at a location.

properties.name: service
properties.description: A service is related to zero or more services.

entities.name: Knowledgeasset
entities.description: An AI Asset used as an information item for other entities like assets and scientific areas.

properties.name: documents
properties.description: An AI asset for which the Knowledge Asset acts as an information source.

entities.name: Publication
entities.description: A scientific publication.

properties.name: pid
properties.description: A Permanent Identifier (e.g. DOI) for the entity.

properties.name: hasISBN
properties.description: The International Standard Book Number, ISBN, used to identify published books or, more rarely, journal issues.

properties.name: hasISSN
properties.description: The International Standard Serial Number, ISSN, an identifer for serial publications.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Subclasses of the expression class (fabio).

entities.name: Agent
entities.description: The direct performer or driver of the action (animate or inanimate) - expected to be person or organisation.

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address of the entity.

properties.name: telephone
properties.description: The telephone number of the agent.

entities.name: Organisation
entities.description: An organized and legally acknowledged group of people, with a specific structure.

properties.name: dateFounded
properties.description: The date the organisation was founded.

properties.name: legalName
properties.description: The official legal name of the organisation.

properties.name: member
properties.description: A member of this organization.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Association, Centre, Company, Education Institution, Research Institution.

properties.name: aiRelevance
properties.description: A description of the association and positioning of the organisation with the broader European AI ecosystem.

entities.name: Person
entities.description: A human being.

properties.name: knowsAbout
properties.description: Having expertise on this topic.

properties.name: memberOf
properties.description: The official legal name of the organisation.

entities.name: Event
entities.description: An event happening at a certain time and location, with a specific scope.

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: The start date and time of the event, formatted as a string using the ISO 8601 date-time format.

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: The end date and time of the event, formatted as a string using the ISO 8601 date-time format.

properties.name: organizer
properties.description: The organisation responsible for organizing the event.

properties.name: performer
properties.description: The person or organisation that is participating with some capacity at the event.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: The duration of the event.

properties.name: eventStatus
properties.description: Can be scheduled, rescheduled, postponed, cancelled, moved online.

properties.name: eventMode
properties.description: Can be offline, online, hybrid.

properties.name: asset
properties.description: AI Assets used or referenced in the context of the Event.

properties.name: project
properties.description: A Project under which the Event is organised.

properties.name: image
properties.description: An image gallery.

properties.name: schedule
properties.description: The agenda of the event.

entities.name: Project
entities.description: A contractually defined initiative aimed to achieve specific objectives.

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: The start date of the project.

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: The end date of the project.

properties.name: totalCostEuro
properties.description: total budget of the project in euros.

properties.name: coordinator
properties.description: the coordinating organisation for the project.

properties.name: participant
properties.description: member organisations of the project.

properties.name: funder
properties.description: the funding organisation for the project.

properties.name: produced
properties.description: An AI asset produced in the context of the project.

properties.name: used
properties.description: An AI asset used in the context of the project.

entities.name: News
entities.description: An article (possibly of mixed modality) that reports or summarizes news

properties.name: headline
properties.description: A short headline given to the news item.

properties.name: alternativeHeadline
properties.description: The end date of the project.

properties.name: category
properties.description: News categories related to this item (e.g Research, Education, Awards, Development, Resources). To be defined as instances of the respective NewsCategory class.

properties.name: status
properties.description: The publication status of the news item (possible values: draft/published/rejected).

properties.name: asset
properties.description: AI Assets referenced in the context of the News item.

properties.name: source
properties.description: The location where the news item was originally published.

properties.name: includesMedia
properties.description: Multimedia content included in the news item.

properties.name: relatedNews
properties.description: A list of news items related to this news item.

properties.name: audience
properties.description: The principal users(s) for which the learning resource was designed. See https://wiki.eoscfuture.eu/display/PUBLIC/B.+v4.00+EOSC+Resource+Profile#B.v4.00EOSCResourceProfile-ResourceTargetUsers.

properties.name: educationalLevel
properties.description: advanced, intermediate, beginner.

properties.name: educationalType
properties.description: see https://wiki.eoscfuture.eu/display/PUBLIC/EOSC+Training+Resource+Profile+-+Data+Model#EOSCTrainingResourceProfileDataModel-Contentresourcetype.

properties.name: complexityLevel
properties.description: e.g. foundational, algorithmic,…

properties.name: qualification
properties.description: Identification of certification, accreditation or badge obtained with course or learning resource.

properties.name: enrollmentStartDate
properties.description: The date from when applications for enrolling can be applied.

properties.name: enrollmentEndDate
properties.description: The final date for which applications for enrolling are accepted.

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: When the resource starts running.

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: When the resource concludes.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: (in hours)

properties.name: pace
properties.description: full-time, part-time, self-paced

properties.name: cost
properties.description: (currency)

properties.name: learningMode
properties.description: online, hybrid, offline

properties.name: academicLevel
properties.description: undergraduate, graduate, PhD

entities.name: Multimedia
entities.description: A non-textual digital object, such as video and audio recordings or images.

properties.name: mimetype
properties.description: The MIME type for the entity.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The size of the entity.

properties.name: copyright
properties.description: A copyright notice for the entity.

properties.name: alternativeText
properties.description: A textual description accompanying the entity for accessibility reasons.

entities.name: Expertise
entities.description: An area of knowledge

entities.name: ApplicationArea
entities.description: A knowledge domain where AI assets can be used

entities.name: ResearchArea
entities.description: The AI research area to which an Asset pertains

entities.name: NewsCategory
entities.description: A categorisation of news items in the AIoD platform

entities.name: Location
entities.description: A spatial region or named place.

entities.name: Size
entities.description: The extent of an entity relative to a specified unit
